text: Terry Crews faces backlash after tweeting about the Black Lives Matter movement: “We must ensure #blacklivesmatter doesn’t morph into #blacklivesbetter.” https://t.co/Iea6kP769z

text: WATCH: At least 16 states are reversing or pausing plans to reopen due to the recent surge in COVID-19 cases across the country. https://t.co/sUlHOYJWbf - @NBCNightlyNews

name: NBCNews
text:
The debate around Mississippi’s state flag is not new, but with the governor’s signature it finally reached a conclusion after many failed attempts to change it. 

The difference this year was the bipartisan leadership by first-term legislators. https://t.co/8oj8EMJcsF

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: Elijah McClain's death sparks question: What evidence do police need to stop a citizen? https://t.co/q5WZRCGCQV - @NBCNewsNOW

name: NBCNews
text: JUST IN: Federal authorities are reviewing whether a civil rights investigation is warranted in the 2019 death of Elijah McClain, a 23-year-old Black man who died after Colorado police put him in a chokehold, officials say. https://t.co/JxFsJBR3Ao

name: NBCNews
text: An employee at a Target store on Long Island, New York, says she was confronted by a customer who demanded she remove a Black Lives Matter mask because they found it offensive. https://t.co/LJhPY0yNT0
